long_description: Flaunt your curves in the flattering Zoic Kate Bike Jersey for women, with its slimming cut and capped sleeves. You'll stay cool, too, thanks to mesh air vents and the deep front zipper. Fabric content varies by color; jersey feels soft and pulls on easily. Mesh panels across upper back enhance airflow for cool comfort. Easy-glide 7.5 in. zipper locks in position when pull is facing down. Zipper garage at collar protects against zipper pinch and abrasion. Hem is longer in back on the Zoic Kate Bike Jersey for better coverage when riding. Double rear pockets have elastic openings; tech pocket holds a phone or tune player.
short_description: Flaunt your curves in the flattering Zoic Kate Bike Jersey for women, with its slimming cut and capped sleeves. You'll stay cool, too, thanks to mesh air vents and the deep front zipper.
